column4: i read from the ubuntu forums that i have to add this line to etc/network/interfaces: iface wlan0 inet dhcp .Will that allow me to browse the internet
thatd be one of a handful of lines youd need to be able to configure the wireless in the interfaces file. its an alternative way of doing configuration
if you can do waht ActionParsnip said, then check your /etc/resolv.conf to see if you have a dns server
